title:
Hold me close in your heart


A love like ours is very hard to find
So let us keep it close in our heart...

attachments.displayName:
Hold me close in your heart


A love like ours is very hard to find
So let us keep it close in our heart
By trusting each other
And holding hands always

Let this bloom beautifully
Make it last for a lifetime
Because you are the best for me
And we belong for each other

Let love be our guide
Let love keep us together
To be us
To be the very best of us

Happy Wednesday!

object.content:
Hold me close in your heart


A love like ours is very hard to find
So let us keep it close in our heart
By trusting each other
And holding hands always

Let this bloom beautifully
Make it last for a lifetime
Because you are the best for me
And we belong for each other

Let love be our guide

To be us
To be the very best of us

Happy Wednesday!

annotation:
This work by +Lilies Indayati  was selected as a HQSP Winners picture and is included in the November HQSP Winners group !
Congratulations!
